job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongDURATIONstrong 6 month contract to hireppstrongCLEARANCEstrong Can start with nothing must be able to obtain interim and then secret clearanceppstrongLOCATIONstrong currently 100 remote and then will be going to a hybrid schedule Scott AF Base 62220ppstrongJOB DESCRIPTIONstrongppstrongReact or Java is biggest requirement  junior level rolestrongppAs an agile software engineer youll join a 7person agilescrum team software developers product owner and scrum master to build customize and integrate new software apps supporting the US Air Force and its air cargoair refuelingaeromedical evacuation enterprise Our software facilitates the delivery of lifesaving cargo during humanitarian crises saving the lives of critically ill Americans and moving US forces to defend against global threats Youll work in a maturing DevSecOps environment with both cloud and onprem infrastructure including the latest technologies in CICD pipelines automated testing cybersecurity frequent deployments and more The job will also include updating existing systems and integrating improvements to work on the user interfaces already in operation Mostly new development would offer a lot of room for advancement and training in houseppbrppstrongJob Responsibilitiesstrongppnbsppp Work with team members to designsustain innovative software that improves and simplifies planning and executing Air Force global air transportation and aerial refueling missionsppnbsppp Design develop document test and debug application software using the newest technologies with good freedom to create and experimentppnbsppp Perform intensive testing of all new and existing programs to ensure they are free of errors and function as intendedppnbsppp Keep up to date on the newest technological innovations in the field and be ready to apply relevant innovations to our software systemsppnbsppp Any experience in one or more core programming languages Java Angular React JavaScriptppnbsppp Any experience using a modern JavaScript framework and libraries such React Angular D3 Vuep
